These/DT are/VBP standard/JJ industrial/NN practices/NN which/WDT are/VBP performed/JJ by/IN farmers/VBG around/IN the/DT world/NN and/CC are/VBP considered/JJ quite/RB safe/JJ as/IN long/JJ as/IN farmers/JJ adhere/NN to/TO the/DT best/JJ practices/NN ./.
